feed.title: Fort St. John - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort St. John
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:25 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -26.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 02:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -26.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -35
Dewpoint: -29.6°C
Wind: NNE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 26 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 26 by morning. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 31 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
